response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your business operations. We believe in the value this product brings and are confident it will exceed your expectations. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers to you, we are offering it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value to both parties and ensures a profitable transaction for us. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 1200000}
